name: mahabhuta-guide
description: Mahabhuta - DOM-processing on the server in Node.js

scripts.postbuildepub: epubtools mimetype rendered && epubtools containerxml rendered book.yml && epubtools makemeta rendered book.yml
scripts.rebuild: npm run cleanepub && npm run buildepub && npm run bundle
scripts.bootstrapsetup: cd bower_components/bootstrap && npm install && npm install grunt-cli && mkdir -p js/tests/unit && cp js/.jshintrc js/tests/unit && mkdir -p docs/assets/js && touch docs/assets/js/raw-files.min.js
scripts.bootstrapbuild: cp readable/Gruntfile.js bower_components/bootstrap && cp readable/variables.less bower_components/bootstrap/less && cp readable/csslintrc bower_components/bootstrap/less/.csslintrc && cd bower_components/bootstrap && grunt
